text: 52:7 Esekiel 33:21Dughiar kamɨn Babilonia dɨvazimɨn vuer mam akarigha Jerusalemɨn aven ghue. Ezɨ Atrivim Sedekaia Jerusalemɨn mɨdorozir gumaziba koma are. Me dɨmagarimɨn suebar ghuava atrivimɨn dagher azenimɨn otivigha ghua, danganir dɨvazir pumuning uaning isasuiragha itir tiar akar kamɨn ghua, Jerusalemɨn nguibar ekiamɨn otivigha ghue. Egha me Jordanɨn Fanemɨn danganir zarimɨn ghuaghirir tuavimɨn zui.
